about_the_game:
Fighting Monsters In West Province is a side scrolling action game that embarks on a thrilling journey in a fantasy world.Defeat monsters with skill and courage,unravel conspiracies with wisdom and experience.You are not fighting alone,your friends in the Local Area Network will fight alongside you.

Dark clouds obscure the moonlight. There is a vicious atmosphere in the wind. The sword is vibrating. Go ahead, young man. The world needs the power of justice. For temporary glory and eternal vows. For joy of saving souls and sadness of corrupt souls. For happy meeting and silent parting. Raise the sword in your hand. Save the world in times of crisis. Bravely fighting against the enemy. Let restlessness return to calmness, let chaos return to tranquility. Do you still remember your initial dream? It journeyed alone across thousands of rivers and mountains, just waiting for you to set sail again.
